testcase.name: Verify if Place is being succesfully added using AddPlaceAPI
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "Rahul" "Hindi" "India"........................passed When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "POST" https request.....................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" on response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" on response body is "APP".......................................passed And verify place_id created maps to "Rahul" using "getPlaceAPI".............passed

testcase.name: Verify if Delete Place functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given DeletePlace Payload...................................................passed When user calls "deletePlaceAPI" with "POST" https request..................passed Then the APU call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed
